name: Escape From Green Room
description:
Green the color of the mind, the color of freshness, the color of emeralds, the color of pathways, the color of vegetation , the color of trees , the color of efforts……

And here it is color of our room

We are going to lock you in a green room...

Collect the items hidden and combine them logically to open the door.

Find the secret codes to open the door and have GREAT ESCAPE!!!!
